title: thunderbird reply
content:
Something has changed in the way Thunderbird is handling Replies. Replies used to be added to the original email with an arrow indicating that the email had been responded to. Now the reply is added to the mail list as a separate email grossly clogging up the list of emails. Sometimes the "replay arrow" is displayed and sometimes not. I do not want the reply shown as a separate email. Is there some setting that will accomplish this? I have been unable to find anything that looks like it would work.

PS The Bold and Italic for this email did not work.
creator: wrangler53

title: Sending emails
content: I can receive emails fine now as I had trouble for a while and didn't use Thunderbird which was a shame as I like it a lot. But now when I try and send an email it comes up with an error message. Please when answering this please keep it really simple when explaining as I am not very computer savvy. tia. I have enclosed the error message

title: Unterordner
content: Ich konnte unter "Posteingang" Unterordner anlegen, um E-Mails darin zu verteilen. Früher konnte man dieselben Unterordnernamen auch unter "Gesendet" erstellen und ich möchte das auch wieder machen. Wieso wird das nicht mehr angeboten? Gibt es einen Ersatz?
creator: hans-d.widmaier
